Question: Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company

Product: ElectricDrive™ 2

- All-season electric vehicle (EV) tire
- Contains at least 50% sustainable materials per tire by weight
- Features SoundComfort Technology® to reduce interior vehicle noise
- Asymmetric tread pattern for confident handling on wet or dry roads
- Available in 17 sizes for leading and emerging consumer EV sedans and CUVs
- Equipped with aerodynamic sidewall and innovative compound for lower rolling resistance
- Available beginning May 2024
- Features foam inserts to reduce interior vehicle sound
- Sustainable materials include soybean oil, rice husk ash silica, and sustainably sourced natural rubber
Summary_cn:
固特异轮胎和橡胶公司

产品: ElectricDrive™ 2

- 全季电动汽车(EV)轮胎
- 每个轮胎至少包含50%的可持续材料
- 采用SoundComfort Technology®减少车内噪音
- 非对称花纹设计，适用于湿地或干地道路的自信操控
- 提供17种规格适用于主流和新兴的消费者EV轿车和CUV
- 配备气动式侧壁和创新化合物，降低滚动阻力
- 从2024年5月开始销售
- 配有泡沫垫片以降低车内噪音
- 可持续材料包括大豆油、稻壳灰二氧化硅和可持续采购的天然橡胶
